About Me

Hi !

I am Siddharth Bhatt. I am a full stack developer.

I graduated from Symbiosis International University in 2015 with a bachelor’s degree in Computer Applications.

I work as iOS Engineer at leftshift.io

I love clean and minimalistic design.

I love C, Objective-C, Swift, Python.

I hate Java. Don’t ask why.

If you also believe NFS:MW(2005) was the best NFS ever made, high five !
